thread.section_title: BooksRun.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BooksRun.com | booksrun.com
thread.title: Amanda Stutz

author: Amanda Stutz
title: Amanda Stutz
text: I was guaranteed $51 for two books that I was selling, and received an email saying that for one of the books, they were only giving me $1 instead of the original $25. I couldn't even get the book sent back to me cause I would've had to pay an extra $8. There was nothing even wrong with the quality of my book and the ISBN was correct. Absolutely ridiculous! Don't use this website!!!!
